title: How to Level up Pokémon in Pokémon Black and White

steps.title: Battle Wild Pokémon or trainers around your Pokémon's level or higher.
steps.content: Battle Wild Pokémon or trainers around your Pokémon's level or higher. Audino is a good Wild Pokémon to battle, since it's a commonly-found Pokémon that gives a lot of experience. You can find one in shaking grass.

steps.title: Give your Pokémon a Lucky Egg, which you receive from Professor Juniper at Chargestone Cave.
steps.content: Give your Pokémon a Lucky Egg, which you receive from Professor Juniper at Chargestone Cave.

steps.title: Give two other Pokémon Exp.
steps.content: Give two other Pokémon Exp. Share. You can find Exp. Share in Castelia City and in Icirrus City.

steps.title: Try to get the Pokérus.
steps.content: Try to get the Pokérus. Pokérus is a Pokémon virus, which causes your Pokémon to grow better. There is no guaranteed way to get it, but you can catch it from wild Pokémon on special occasions.

steps.title: Try trading your Pokémon to a friend, then get them to trade back.
steps.content: Try trading your Pokémon to a friend, then get them to trade back. This will cause the Pokémon to level up faster.

steps.title: After you get the first badge, you have access to rustling grass.
steps.content: After you get the first badge, you have access to rustling grass. Most times it will be Audino but on small occasions there will be others.

steps.title: Fight these special Pokémon.
steps.content: Fight these special Pokémon. This will give you more experience than the other Pokémon you run into in the tall grass.

steps.title: Keep trying.
steps.content: Keep trying. Rustling grass will come up every once in a while. The best thing to do is walk/run next to grass, but not in it, until the grass moves.
